numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that more than 50 percent of the players in each major sports league are people of color.
2. Major League Baseball is an exception.
3. I noticed that the percentage of coaches of color in each major sports league is much lower than 50 percent.
4. I wonder why there are few coaches of color in each major sports league.
5. I wonder whether something prevents more coaches of color from earning these positions.
6. I noticed that less than 50 percent of Major League Baseball players are people of color.
7. I wonder why less than 50 percent of Major League Baseball players are people of color.
8. I wonder how these percentages compare to data from 20 years ago.
9. This situation impacts me and my community.
10. Some people of color in my community aspire to coach in these leagues.
11. Some people of color in my community may not have the opportunity to coach in these leagues because of their race.
12. A person should never have a lesser opportunity because of the person's race.
13. This issue has been ongoing in the world.
15. The graph shows that there are fewer coaches of color than players of color in these major sports leagues.
16. The graph depicts a lack of coaches of color in these leagues.
17. The headline is: Racism in the game.
